fixes.name: WATM(d) T-1
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR Numerator = SUMX('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)', 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD X (excl Int/FWD)] * 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[DTM])
VAR Denominator = SUM('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD X (excl Int/FWD)])
RETURN DIVIDE(Numerator, Denominator)
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated Tableau SUM([Initial Cash USD X (excl Int/FWD)]*[DTM])/SUM([Initial Cash USD X (excl Int/FWD)]) to DAX using SUMX for the row-by-row product and DIVIDE for safe division.

fixes.name: Change in WATM
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR WATMT = [WATM(d) T]
VAR WATMPrev = [WATM(d) T-1]
RETURN WATMT - WATMPrev
fixes.solution_explanation: Direct subtraction of the two measures WATM(d) T and WATM(d) T-1 to mirror the Tableau expression [WATM(d) T]-[WATM(d) T-1].
